channel.title: Left 4 dead 2 sale
channel.description:
Steam is having L4D2 on sale again, obviously...and because I'm deluded enough to think I have a chance at the sweepstakes, I'm looking for someone who also wants it to gift the same game to each other to complete one of the objectives. Technically it's not [i]selling[/i] games, so shouldn't be illegal...
Feel free to close this thread.
